Title: Sr. Business Analyst
Description:
Job Summary

Job Summary

We are seeking a Sr. Business Analyst with 6 to 10 years of experience to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in SAP STS and will work in a hybrid model. This role involves day shifts and does not require travel. The Sr. Business Analyst will play a crucial role in analyzing business processes identifying areas for improvement and implementing SAP solutions to enhance operational efficiency.
Responsibilities

Responsibilities

• Analyze business processes to identify areas for improvement and optimization.
• Collaborate with stakeholders to gather and document business requirements.
• Develop detailed functional specifications for SAP implementations.
• Provide expertise in SAP modules to support business operations.
• Conduct gap analysis and recommend SAP solutions to address business needs.
• Oversee the configuration and customization of SAP systems.
• Perform system testing and validation to ensure accuracy and functionality.
• Train end-users on SAP functionalities and best practices.
• Monitor SAP system performance and troubleshoot issues as needed.
• Ensure compliance with industry standards and company policies.
• Prepare and present reports on project progress and outcomes.
• Coordinate with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless integration of SAP solutions.
• Support post-implementation activities and continuous improvement initiatives.
Qualifications

Qualifications

• Possess a Bachelors degree in Business Administration Information Technology or a related field.
• Have a minimum of 6 years of experience in business analysis with a focus on SAP.
• Demonstrate strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
• Exhibit excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
• Show proficiency in SAP modules such as SAP FI/CO SAP MM or SAP SD.
• Display the ability to work effectively in a hybrid work model.
• Have experience in conducting system testing and validation.
• Be capable of training end-users and providing ongoing support.
• Show a track record of successful SAP implementations.
• Demonstrate the ability to work independently and as part of a team.
• Possess strong project management skills.
• Be detail-oriented and able to manage multiple tasks simultaneously.
• Exhibit a proactive approach to identifying and solving business challenges.
Certifications Required

Certifications Required

SAP Certified Application Associate Certified Business Analysis Professional (CBAP)
